title: Italian Ambassador pays farewell call
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Out going Ambassador Mr. Pio Mariani for Republic of Italy in Sri Lanka paid his farewell call on President Mahinda Rajapaksa at temple trees on Friday19th February. Foreign Affairs Minister Rohitha Bogollagama, Secretary to the President Mr. Lalith Weerathunga, and Foreign Secretary Mr. Romesh…
